      • openSchema

        public void openSchema(WHDBMSFactory factory,
              boolean isMain,
              boolean createSchema,
              boolean startThread)
                throws SQLException
        Open the schema provided by the WHDBMSFactory
        Parameters:
        factory - the WHDBMSFactory to be opened
        isMain - true if the opened WHDBMSFactory should be set as Main schema
        createSchema - true if the schema have to be created
        startThread - true to setup a thread to check the connection every hour
        Throws:
        SQLException
